name: Comfort and Joy Caterers
safetyTips: Delivery made to front door before knocking or ringing bell before stepping back 2m to ensure customer is available to take order.
description: For the last 17 years, we have had a stall at the North Cross Road Market every Saturday. Since lockdown, are now working from our shop in Crystal Palace. Our food is home-cooked, deli-style, made using fresh ingredients every week. Currently deliver on Saturdays only to SE6, SE19-27 inclusive, SW2, SW12, SW16 & CR7 - free delivery (minimum order Â£25).  All deliveries are made by members of our staff via van.
